answers.answer: My son was at 6 pounds 10oz at 34 weeks,I'm 35 weeks now. I was told I have the option for a membrane sweep or be induced at 38 weeks if he is over a certain weight and they said at 39 weeks I can opt for a c section if he is over a certain weight as well. They said I can still try naturally  of I would like and they also said if I go into labor now they won't stop it since he is so big and would prefer early labor for me.

If they measured weight on ultra sound that is not always correct. They told me with my first that my son was only going to be about 6 pounds and he came out 8'8! And typically won't induce unless a medical reason
The only medical reason i would have would be gestational diabetes wich tends to make babies alot bigger
Idk but that is big my son is in the 44th percentile weighing around 6 lbs at 36 weeks and not expected to gain a lot more good luck my daughter was 8 lbs 5 oz at 41 weeks
Wow yeah she is a chunker i just hope they do something i dont want her to gain alot more weight and she was 6 pounds at my 34 week ultrasound and im only 37 weeks now
They might for the diabetes I would talk to your doctor
Yeah i have an oppointment tomorrow but im wondering why she is gaining so much weight i have been eating right and my blood sugars are normal
Does anyone know why she is getting so big my blood sugar is fine and i eat like i should maybe she just eats all my food literally loll
I have gd and my baby weighed 4lbs 2oz at 30 weeks and my midwife Said she wouldn't induce me no matter how big the baby is unless she's stressed then they would do a c section
My cousin had gestational diabetes, her baby was almost 10lbs, and she had her baby c section. Her first was 9 lbs n she delivered vaginally.
Omg i just think 8 poundd is big fpr 37 weeks i mean i have 3 more weeks for her to grow then what will she weigh

My mum had fot 10lbs babies all vaginal births. She didn't have gd, just big babies. Ibhad my son at 35wks via csection due to complications, he was 7lbs2oz. I'm pretty sure he would have been close to 10lbs if I'd gone full term.

My first was 9 lbs 15 oz I had him at 38 weeks  but because he was so big n had wide shoulders on top of that I had to have a c section my second was 8 lbs 13 oz at 39 weeks...I didnt have gestational diabetes with either

question: How many of you ladies had big babies right now my daughter is weighing at 8 pounds she is above the 98 percentile and they said that was generous so my question is im only 37 weeks will they induce me or do a c section bevause she is big
title: how many
